channel.title: Web Development on Zenvila
channel.description: Recent content in Web Development on Zenvila

item.title: ZenChat – Fully Dockerized Flask Chat Application
item.description: Lightweight real-time chat application using Flask and SQLite3, fully containerized with Docker for portable deployment.

item.title: Automated Timetable Management System
item.description: Web-based system to eliminate manual PDF searching for class or exam timetables with personalized access and admin management panel.

item.title: Expense Tracker
item.description: Web application for managing income and expenses with secure login, transaction tracking, and graphical data visualization.

item.title: FAST Aggregate Calculator
item.description: Deployed aggregate calculator for FAST entry test scores during internship to help students compute their entry test scores.

item.title: Airline Management System
item.description: Database management system for airline operations with booking and management features.

item.title: Super Store Management System
item.description: Web-based store management system for inventory and sales tracking.
